statements: DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 123 AND class_id = 456;
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 123 AND date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE participation > 50 AND attendance = 'P';
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM student_participation WHERE participation_score < 70 AND student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = false);
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101 AND attendance_status = 'Present';
DELETE FROM participation WHERE course_id = 3 AND student_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 1 AND date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM Participation WHERE course_id = 101 AND points < 50;
